title: Attacking a Macro Security Problem with Micro-segmentation
description: Ransomware is everywhere. And the shift of workloads to the cloud and employees to work-from-home models has only expanded the attack surface, creating new opportunities for attackers to leverage. Companies need Zero Trust solutions that not only defend against threat actors gaining access to enterprise systems, but also mitigate the impact of infections that slip through the cracks.
author: Charlie Gero
